title: 3 and Out - NFC West Arms Race; Draft QB Intangibles; Pro Day Overreaction; MNF Flex Lifeline; Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - NFC West Arms Race; Draft QB Intangibles; Pro Day Overreaction; MNF Flex Lifeline; Mailbag
description:
In this episode, John explains why the hyper-competitive NFC West forced the Niners to take a big swing and move up to the #3 pick, why draft QB intangibles matter so much, why pro days are more important for learning about a player's personality than his on-field performance, why the NFL allowing ESPN to flex out the MNF game is a huge improvement under the new TV deal, and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag. Follow John on Twitter and SUBSCRIBE now to get all the latest content!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
